name: Hunters
description:
Escape from a terrifying monster in this challenging platformer.

This game was developed by the College of Dupage Game Development Club over the fall 2020 semester.

Credits:

Project Lead: Aurora Troncoso

Designers: Joyce Langman, Carson Christ

Lead Artist: McKenna Fisher

Lead Programmer: Alex Radisavljevic

Technical Support: James E. Pytel II, Phillip Kobylinski
developers: College of Dupage Game Development Club
